website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive, and comfortable — this airbed gets the job done.
pros: Great for camping when space is at a premium
Good for family gatherings where you need a lot of extra beds, especially for kids
Plush flocked top helps keep sheets in place
cons: No pump included, so be sure to take one with you

customer_reviews.title: Same Mattress at Walmart
customer_reviews.text: This is the exact same mattress that you can drive down to Walmart for and pay half the price. The mattress is a great value still for the money, but $8 at Walmart makes it a crazy deal in comparison. I got the mattress as we had a hole in one of ours for when we are car camping. The mattress lost air the first two nights, but after using it a couple times it stopped stretched and held air better. For the price you can't beat the mattress, unless you buy it for $8.
customer_reviews.author: Mama be

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product; no leaks after 1 month w/ single inflation
customer_reviews.text: After 1 month of use: zero problems (an inflatable sofa purchased at the same time suffered one deflation/leak - the $65 Queen size convertible one that Amazon sells). Filled with air straight from box, and has not needed a single refill. Two of us walk on it constantly and it's used almost every night. No bad smell; the ridges are love or hate (I prefer the vertical style - you can align your nose into it at night for easier breathing if you sleep on your stomach now and then).
customer_reviews.author: Deep Freeze

customer_reviews.title: They were easy to fill and easy to empty out once done
customer_reviews.text: We got this and two additional mattresses for out wedding. They were easy to fill and easy to empty out once done. My guests were comfortable and the had enough space.
customer_reviews.author: Elixia M

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Not super comfortable but totally worth the price. I use this for car camping and this is way better than those thin sleeping pads that people generally use for camping. Zero problem with leaks so far. No plastic smell. Stays nice and inflated over night
customer_reviews.author: Robert M.

customer_reviews.title: It last a year and less than 10 uses
customer_reviews.text: I got the mattress and used less than 10 times when it got a whole that I couldn't find.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to inflate/deflate. I had to add a little more air after filling for the first time, but that was stated in the instructions so not unexpected. After that it stayed inflated all night and was perfectly comfortable on hard and rocky ground at the campsite.
customer_reviews.author: JackieMC

customer_reviews.title: It deflated all night over and over.
customer_reviews.text: It wouldn't stay inflated and had to keep getting up to inflate it. Was really unhappy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly McQuinn

customer_reviews.title: Intex is a product I rely on, and after ...
customer_reviews.text: Intex is a product I rely on, and after downsizing to a smaller home, this two airbed is just what I needed for unexpected guests.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Marcelin

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Great value, comfortable for what your getting. Just doesn’t stand up to time. Replaced about once a year.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Air mattress has a slow leak
customer_reviews.text: Although this air mattress was only used for a 5 year old and we just bought it in June, it is virtually useless two months later. It started fine but then began to leak air. We found and patched one hole but cannot locate anything else. I've contacted the company Intex but they were of no assistance. I was very disappointed in this product. I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: L.S.

customer_reviews.title: nice air bed
customer_reviews.text: was a replacement for an identical one our teenage grandson borrowed. good quality and value
customer_reviews.author: its me

customer_reviews.title: Good Price....
customer_reviews.text: Got this to lay out in the sun on. Good price so if it fails I don't have a lot invested. It has performed good so-far.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Butler

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased this brand before and it is a great value. It is comfortable enough to use for a week of camping on the ground. And easy for sleep overs.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Rushmer

customer_reviews.title: Good at first but died after a few nights
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for 1y of sparse usage (3-4x) then died on 1st night of camping trip.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Quandt

customer_reviews.title: stays full
customer_reviews.text: really comfy! filled up very quick and stayed full all night. i used it for camping in the back of my explorer. i had to leave the hatch open but it wasnt a problem.
customer_reviews.author: chris switzer

customer_reviews.title: Hole
customer_reviews.text: Hole in it when blowing it up for the first time. No pump included...I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: It comes with its own pump but you need batteries which are not included. The air mattress is good quality but I only wish it could be 2 inches higher.
customer_reviews.author: mariela torres

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put up and take down.
customer_reviews.text: We have two and use them when the Grandkids sleep over. They have worked out great.
customer_reviews.author: photo

customer_reviews.title: comfy but cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Was comfortable for the week I was able to use it, but then started to slow leak air and after thoroughly checking it 3x for holes was unable to find any and company told us it was probably a faulty seal for the pump
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Good airbed. Used it for camping and it provided a good night's sleep.
customer_reviews.author: T Brown

customer_reviews.title: Air bed
customer_reviews.text: I like this product lol we have two of them they are great
customer_reviews.author: Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Used 2 nights next evening blew a seam and had a big bubble in middle of bed!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a cheap piece of China crap !!!!! worthless !!!! Warranty worthless
customer_reviews.author: Richard Blake

customer_reviews.title: Maybe just got the odd one out of the batch
customer_reviews.text: Didnt even hold air over night. By the morning was laying on a deflated piece of rubber on top of the ground
customer_reviews.author: ENGINEER88

customer_reviews.title: Extremely unsatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Immediately after we received this we aired it up and it went flat within a half hour. We tried over and over to fill it but it never held air. Big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked good for the 2 days I needed to use it .
customer_reviews.author: wanda  argueta

customer_reviews.title: One did not hold pressure
customer_reviews.text: I bought two and one did not hold pressure overnight. The other one seems OK and the return date has passed so I have to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D.

customer_reviews.title: Size not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The thickness of this mattress is listed as 8.75 inches, but the two I received are 10 inches thick.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M.

customer_reviews.title: Expect it to break in 30 days.
customer_reviews.text: It costs $8 at Walmart. The mattress only lasts 1 month. Then it will bust a seam and fling you off at 2AM. Their customer support site will tell you to call. Then when you do, they refuse to look up the existing case and make you refile over the phone. It's just busywork to distract you while they do nothing.
customer_reviews.author: crunchies

customer_reviews.title: Double valve is the best!
customer_reviews.text: The double valve is worth it’s weight in gold. I leave my air mattress inflated and it must have a tiny leak because after half a night sleeping on it it’s always a little low. Usually trying to blow up an air mattress a tiny bit is a pain because you open it and alllll the air gushes out, but not with this design! The double valve keeps the air in place while you open the outer valve and add more air to finish it up! Seriously a time saver and totally why I’m buying a second one of these for camping.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Balaban

customer_reviews.title: Comfy bed
customer_reviews.text: Great bed and very comfy. It is easy to inflate and deflate and I've had some good nights of sleep on it.
customer_reviews.author: korriaan

customer_reviews.title: not as good
customer_reviews.text: Both beds only held air for 2 weeks. Usually they last a month to six weeks, sleeping on every night
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Roy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got it just in time! Should have gone bigger but it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Epaloose jr

customer_reviews.title: works great, buy pump
customer_reviews.text: worked well.. just make sure to buy a pump too
customer_reviews.author: AaronHagler

product_meta.title: Intex Classic Downy Airbed, Twin
product_meta.description: Size:TwinInflatable Twin airbed suitable for indoor or outdoor use. 2-In-1 valve with extra-wide opening makes inflation and deflation easy and quick. Inflates with most manual or electric air pumps (pump not included). standard queen size provides a good fit when using fitted sheets. Dimensions: 39 x 8.75 x 75 inches (w x h x l), 300-pound capacity.
feature_bullets: Inflatable Twin airbed suitable for indoor or outdoor use
2-in-1 valve with extra-wide opening makes inflation and deflation easy and quick. Inflates with most manual or electric air pumps (pump not included)
Standard queen size provides a good fit when using fitted sheets
Dimensions: 39 x 8.75 x 75 inches (w x H x L), 300-Pound capacity; Airbed Pump: None

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars77 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
